channel.title: Survival
channel.description:
I don't support this new plugin in anyway, or any editing of pvp. But if you're going to do this and as David described make people help each other survive, and think like we're all in this game together then I think survival needs to be made more challenging. This is one of the very core reasons why myself and a few others consider raiding, and pvp.
To survive all one needs to do is mine 30 blocks, get coal and make a few torches and boom, you're safe from mobs. It isn't survival it's just plain easy and gets boring. I think actually surviving needs to be made more difficult, which means people would actually want to work together because it would be harder to survive. Right now it's incredibly easy to survive and you don't need anyone else's help at all, you can be a long independent raider.
I think this needs to change, it would surely make up for the plugins and changes people want. It just readds that edge to the game that pvp and raiding has. I don't want to jump the gun and go off suggesting ways, so what do you think? And what would you suggest?

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest

@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t really want to rush into doing it, I’m waiting for more discussion about it.

The general idea seems to be: Support but no map reset. Maybe we can arrange for a group of people to meet up, and move closer together, or something?

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m trying to test how this will work, myself and matty have setup a city outside spawn for newcomers, we’ve protected them from raiding and shown them how to play the game and develop their resources.

It genuinely has made a difference, the people are now working together to finish the roof to stop spiders getting in.

PS Marc, we need your help in the city

Read full topic

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I think if we’re going to remove pvp, we should host PVP events or PVP weekends so we may keep both parties interested in the server (parties being those interested and not so interested in pvp) It’ll also add a bit of fun and games into the server I suppose, something to look forward to.

Read full topic

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well I guess if we basically remove raiding we could have unlimited chest protections, OR if frowning is just generally frowned upon, people can use bb stick to see who stole from them, and then other people can help them get it back.

Also I think we had flint and steel/lava nerfd, but natural fires were still a go.

Read full topic

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:27, topic:399659”]Unity is the only way.[/quote]It seems like everyone is diluted into thinking we have a mature player base which is capable of unity.

But go for it I’m interested in seeing what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Sooo? How do we stop people from raiding? We wouldn’t even be able to kill them. Someone could just walk into a town take everything and burn it.

Read full topic

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Create a new topic instead of moving this one. I also think there should be other things changed, not just enabling creeper explosions. That would make it harder but not hard enough in my view.

@Si force: For me it is two ways, pvp or harder survival. I think adding harder survival would not only be better, but it would also potentially increase the amount of players even further. The amount of people that get upset and quit due to pvp is quite annoying.
[hr]

On another note, the adding of the protection plugin would worsen the current situation, it certainly wouldn’t stop me raiding people. If I intended to raid someone who had protected there area I would probably go for a highway man approach.

Just like on runescape, they would patrol between two cities or a highly resource rich area. If you think about it, this plugin could help raiders because it would allow someone to starve another of resources.

Stand and deliver or pay with your life!

Read full topic

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:23, topic:399659”]Yea I meant we should probably move it when I said it should be public

But to be honest, to me it sounds like changing it around would be kinda pointless with the same map, because it’s all already been done (IE people been stolen from, unbalanced power etc)

It would also be the perfect opportunity to put that anti-xray mod (and maybe a new speed hack mod?) in to make the game even MORE balanced…

Also, what’s so bad about a reset? (Besides the fact that you promised you wouldn’t) Shouldn’t it be a vote like everything else?[/quote]Because there’s no compensation for the days of work I’ve put into my structures.

Read full topic

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:20, topic:399659”]I really think we should discuss all non-staff related things in the public section, like this for example, there is really no reason for it not to be public. Anyone against moving it out there? If no one says so in a day or something, I’ll do it.

I don’t care about configuration/plugin changes and stuff, but as you guys guessed I am 100% against a map reset, if things around spawn are too messed up, we can move spawn, that isn’t a problem. But as before, many don’t want a map reset, many might want one, but the ones that want one can go someplace else, the ones that don’t can’t move their creation to a new map. I’ve always said and promised I wouldn’t reset the map unless no choice was given like the last time (when it was corrupted), so I’m not going to reset it (like I said, a spawn relocation would be OK though).[/quote]I’m all up for moving the topic. As for more moving spawn if its really necessary we can build a city somewhere and move it there.

Read full topic

item.title: Survival
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I really think we should discuss all non-staff related things in the public section, like this for example, there is really no reason for it not to be public. Anyone against moving it out there? If no one says so in a day or something, I’ll do it.

I don’t care about configuration/plugin changes and stuff, but as you guys guessed I am 100% against a map reset, if things around spawn are too messed up, we can move spawn, that isn’t a problem. But as before, many don’t want a map reset, many might want one, but the ones that want one can go someplace else, the ones that don’t can’t move their creation to a new map. I’ve always said and promised I wouldn’t reset the map unless no choice was given like the last time (when it was corrupted), so I’m not going to reset it (like I said, a spawn relocation would be OK though).

Read full topic
